message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. My initial offer is $12,000 for the product.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider the value of the product and my own costs. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $11,000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value you're offering.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $11,000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. My final offer is $10,800 for the product. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.

Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,800 and $9,500, which is $10,150. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle on this one.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. However, I'm willing to make one last concession. My counteroffer is $10,500 for the product. This is as low as I'm willing to go.

Alice, I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $10,000. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
